Hi,

I'm a little confused about this problem. Every time I created several=
 
jobs, and then I let heritrix start crawling, but it seemed that only 
on=
e job could be run at one time, and all the others were pending. 
However a=
s I know, Wget could run a group of jobs at the same time. Is 
it a way I c=
ould run several jobs together in heritrix? Thanks a lot!

Have a nice day!=
